name: Vector Assault
description: Vector Assault is a fast paced twin stick shooter where you have to survive a onslaught of enemy attackers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz processor or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0 compatible or later DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X 9.0 compatible sound card Additional Notes: XBox One controller support
